articles.title: Grand opening for Luxor's 'Avenue of the Sphinxes'
articles.description: The ancient walkway, connecting two of the Egyptian city's greatest temples, took decades to excavate.
articles.content:
Pharaonic chariots and hundreds of performers featured in a lavish ceremony to mark the opening to the public of the 3,000 year old Avenue of Sphinxes in Luxor, Egypt.
It's taken decades to excavate… [+392 chars]

articles.title: Covid: Africa travel restrictions over variant fear
articles.description: Several southern African countries have been added to the red list, Health Secretary Sajid Javid says.
articles.content:
Travellers arriving from several southern African countries will have to quarantine amid warnings over a new Covid variant.

articles.title: Death toll soars to 52 in Russian coal mine accident
articles.description: A search for survivors after a fire in a Siberian mine turns to tragedy, with rescuers among the dead.
articles.content:
The death toll from an accident at a Siberian coal mine has risen to 52, according to Russian media reports.
